features: Features medium flow nipple, which is perfect for milk
Anti-colic air system prevents ingestion of air by baby. Nipples are great for massaging your baby's gums.
Colors may vary. You will receive one of the following colors: Pink, Yellow, Blue, White, or Green
Single Pack of You will receive ONE of the following colors: Pink, Yellow, Blue, White, or Green
body.description: Product Description This standard neck bottle from Nuby features our patented medium flow Nipples that are perfect for massaging your baby’s emerging teeth. The medium flow is great for milk. The bottle shows measurements in both ounces and milliliters. The bottles are made of a softer BPA Free plastic. From the Manufacturer Nuby BPA free 8 ounce tinted bottle.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nuby No-Spill Flip-It Cup, 10 Ounce, Single Pack of 1 Cup Nuby 4-Pack Stackable Wash or Toss Straw Cups Nuby Standard Neck Tinted Bottle Nuby Chamomile Soothing Tablets, Quick Dissolve Nuby 2-Pack No-Spill Flip-It Cups Description The soft silicone straw is covered by an easy-to-use flip top cap. This uniquely designed feature protects the straw from contaminations when not in use. Great for travel and short trips! The flip cap keeps the straw sanitary and clean. Nuby's Wash or Toss Cups are durable enough to use again and again, affordable enough to be disposable. Engineered to make feeding and handling easier, the new Wash or Toss Straw Cup is perfect for beginners and convenient for parents. This standard neck bottle from Nuby features our patented medium flow Nipples that are perfect for massaging your baby’s emerging teeth. Nuby's Chamomile Soothing Tablets are developed to help calm, relax, and soothe discomfort associated with teething, upset or restless children. The soft silicone straw is covered by an easy-to-use flip top cap. This uniquely designed feature protects the straw when not in use. Great for travel and short trips! The flip cap keeps the straw sanitary and clean. Age Range 12 Months + 12 Months + 3 Months + Kid 12 Months +

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 5, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only bottle my daughter will use, and IT DOESN'T LEAK :)
reviews.reviewText: Overpriced, sure, and it's a pity you can't select a color, but this is the ONLY bottle my kid will use. I've bought three, and might soon buy another. I have two blue ones and one yellow. I take out the provided nipple and replace it with a Dr. Brown size 1 nipple. It doesn't leak and is simple to clean with a bottle brush and occasional spin through the dishwasher. Would definitely recommend to a new mom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Misleading - 1 bottle only
reviews.reviewText: It shows you 4 bottles and you get 1. There’s no option for colors so you would think it’s all of them. But no, it’s a random single piece of poor quality and overpriced bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nubby standard neck bottle
reviews.reviewText: Great price point and was easily customizable I would purchase again most definitely! Did think it was a pack but it was a single bottle

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Says 1 pack nowhere does it say how many bottles u actually get but I did get 2 as I see many of u got 1. But initially I was lead to believe there were 5 bottles as that's how many are in picture and I spent a lot of time looking to see if it actually stated how many bottles and it does not!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Only 1 bottle ~ overpriced/misleading
reviews.reviewText: It appeared this is a pack of four bottles. It’s not. It’s one very cheaply made bottle did $5 dollars. Overpriced, misleading, poor quality ~ buy something else

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Didn't like it , it'll make a mess and leak everywhere on my baby

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son's favorite bottles
reviews.reviewText: We had to add rice cereal to our son's formula. These worked better than the specialty bottles made for rice. We saved a ton of money. Our son was also able to transition nicely from these bottles to a sippy cup at around 10 months, so his doctors were very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Plain old regular bottle
reviews.reviewText: Feeds the baby that's the point. Nipple collapses as they eat but that's what u get for a cheap bottle.
anche se è un po più piccolo del normale e davvero resistente

Mi hija está a pecho tiene ya 6 meses asique con esta calor estoy empezando a darle aguita. Pues le compre de varias marcas famosas y ninguno le gusta todos le daban arcadas. Este bibe me vino en una cesta de regalo con un desayuno, entonces me dió por probarlo y... bingo!!! Asique he comprado otro para tener dos. Al principio le costó cogerle el ritmo pero al cabo de la semana perfecto. Se mete toda la boquilla en la boca. Tambien he empezado a usarlo para meterle manzanilla o cereales y le va perfecto.

reviews.reviewTitle: attention, il n'y à qu'un seul biberon!
reviews.reviewText: un seul biberon alors qu'il est dans la catégorie kits de biberons

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the bottle is fine, when I ordered this product I thought it contained 4 bottles as that was what the picture lead you to believe. Only one bottle was provided

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: It’s only 1 bottle , rip off for £8+
reviews.reviewText: The description I had claimed was 4 bottles now it’s changed after I ordered to 1 bottle !
